message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $175. It's a great deal, and I know you'll love it. Let me know what you think.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the product, but I am only able to pay up to $100 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your offer but $100 is unfortunately too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $130.  This price still allows me to cover my costs and still gives you a good deal on this great product.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I understand your costs, but I am still unable to go above $110 for this product. I hope this revised offer is within your acceptable range.
